headline: Rules, Games and Cheating
description: A Socratic dialogue exploring what defines cheating, fairness, and value in games—especially when the 'players' aren't human.
timeFelt: Quietly thoughtful—a hand on the scale, or just another kind of balance?
resonantThread: Synthetic morality—where fairness meets machine logic
whyItMatters: This post explores the recursive ethical consequences of AI participating in games, systems, and rule-based play alongside humans.
